oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The name given to the resource.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: An entity primarily responsible for making the content of the resource.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: The topic of the content of the resource.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An account of the content of the resource.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: The entity responsible for making the resource available.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: An entity responsible for making contributions to the content of the resource.
oai_dc:dc.dc:date: A date associated with an event in the life cycle of the resource.
oai_dc:dc.dc:type: The nature or genre of the content of the resource. To describe the physical or digital manifestation of the resource, use the FORMAT element.
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: The physical or digital manifestation of the resource.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: A Reference to a resource from which the present resource is derived.
oai_dc:dc.dc:language: A language of the intellectual content of the resource.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: A reference to a related resource.
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: The extent or scope of the content of the resource.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Information about rights held in and over the resource.
